content:
seriously I have little idea what you are talking about, but I assume it has something to do with your list of mails in the inbox.

Is it possible that you have turned on one of the options in the quick search toolbar that limits what you can see.
creator: MattAuSupport

content:
When I delete 140 messages, Thunderbird used to show how many messages it had not deleted yet.

The same for moving messages from the Inbox to another group.

content: With consumer gmail accounts, IMAP can be enabled or disabled for each folder, in the webmail settings (Settings/Labels). Open your account in webmail and see if there is a similar setting.
creator: sfhowes
